Package meka.classifiers.multitarget

Class SCC

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.ProblemTransformationMethod
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.LC
            • meka.classifiers.multilabel.PS
              • meka.classifiers.multitarget.NSR
                • meka.classifiers.multitarget.SCC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MultiLabelClassifier, MultiTargetClassifier, MultiXClassifier, MultiLabelDrawable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class SCC
extends NSR
implements weka.core.Randomizable, MultiTargetClassifier, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    SCC.java - Super Class Classifier (aka Super Node Classifier). The output space is manipulated into super classes (based on label dependence), upon which a multi-target base classifier is applied. This is related to the RAkELd-type classifiers for multi-label classification.
    Version:
    June 2012
    Author:
    Jesse Read
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
